survey_brief: Assess customer experiences with in-store digital kiosks to optimize usability, functionality, and overall satisfaction in retail environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with digital kiosks when visiting retail stores?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced frequency scale. Ensure mobile-responsive layout for option buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you interact with digital kiosks when visiting retail stores?

questions.question_text: Which features do you typically use on digital kiosks? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Limit to 5 core features for clarity. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; allow up to 5 selections.

script.question_text: Which features do you typically use on digital kiosks? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the responsiveness of digital kiosk touchscreens?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale. Include 'Neutral' midpoint.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with vertical alignment.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the responsiveness of digital kiosk touchscreens?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: Have you experienced technical issues with digital kiosks in the past 6 months?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Unsure' option for recall uncertainty.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with 'Yes' as first option.

script.question_text: Have you experienced technical issues with digital kiosks in the past 6 months?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Every visit', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: What type of technical issues did you encounter? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with text field for rare cases.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' triggering a text input.

script.question_text: What type of technical issues did you encounter? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to prefer digital kiosks over staff-assisted transactions for routine tasks?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Measure behavioral intent with a 5-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with horizontal layout.
